# Case Normalization Test

URLs should be normalized for scheme and domain case sensitivity.

## Various Case Formats

Official documentation is available [1] and also linked as [2].
The same resource appears in different formats [3], [4], and [5].

## Mixed References

Referencing the docs [1], [2], [3], [4], and [5] throughout
the document shows how case variations are handled.

[1]: HTTP://EXAMPLE.COM/docs
[2]: http://example.com/docs
[3]: http://Example.Com/docs
[4]: HTTPS://EXAMPLE.COM/docs
[5]: https://example.com/docs
